edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Variable

Packages that use Variable 
Package Description
edu.citadel.cprl  
edu.citadel.cprl.ast  

  • Uses of Variable in edu.citadel.cprl

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return Variable 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Variable Parser.parseVariable()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    variable = ( varId | paramId ) ( "[" expression "]" )* .
    Variable Parser.parseVariableExpr()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    variable = ( varId | paramId ) ( "[" expression "]" )* .
    This method provides common logic for methods parseVariable() and parseNamedValue().

  • Uses of Variable in edu.citadel.cprl.ast

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  NamedValue
    The abstract syntax tree node for a named value.

    Constructor Description
    AssignmentStmt​(Variable variable, Expression expr, Position assignPosition)
    Construct an assignment statement with a variable, an expression, and the position of the assignment operator.
    NamedValue​(Variable var)
    Construct a named value from a variable.
    ReadStmt​(Variable variable)
    Construct a read statement with the specified variable for storing the input.
